response.job_title: Software Engineer - Backend Developer - JavaScript - TypeScript - NodeJS - Angular
response.summary:
I am a highly skilled and motivated software engineer with 9+ years of professional experience. With a focus on backend development, I have spent the last 6 years working with various technologies, including NodeJs (both Typescript and Javascript) and Angular. I am passionate about developing innovative solutions to common problems and am always striving to continue growing and learning in my field.

My technical skills include:

* Backend development using NodeJs, Express, and NestJS frameworks
* Strong experience with Typescript and Javascript
* Knowledge of Angular for front-end development
* Familiarity with databases such as MongoDB and SQL
* Experience with cloud platforms like AWS and Google Cloud
* Knowledge of REST API design and implementation

In addition to my technical skills, I am a team player who enjoys collaborating with others to achieve common goals. I believe that working in a supportive and inclusive environment is crucial to success and am always willing to lend a hand to my colleagues.

Outside of work, I have a strong interest in staying current with the latest technological developments and keeping up with new trends in software engineering.

Measurable accomplishments include:

* Successfully delivered multiple projects on time and within budget.
* Implemented agile development methodologies to increase efficiency and collaboration within teams.
* Mentored junior developers and provided technical support to colleagues.
* Contributed to open-source projects to give back to the community and expand my knowledge.

If you're interested in learning more about my skills and experience, or if you have an opportunity that you think would be a good fit, please feel free to reach out to me at egarzondev@gmail.com. I look forward to hearing from you!
response.skills: Leadership, JavaScript, Node.js, Angular, TypeScript, Desarrollo de software, Programación, PostgreSQL, Git, Inglés, Liderazgo, Unity, Go, Java

profile_positions.description:
Development and refactoring of APIs according to customer requirements for the onboarding and rostering component.
Helping to improve the performance of the pod and other partners by implementing continuous improvements.
Tech Stack: JavaScript, TypeScript, NodeJS, NestJS, Lerna, Postgres, REST, AWS, GIT, Redis.
profile_positions.title: NodeJS Developer

profile_positions.description:
Subocol — August, 2020 – April 2021
Development of a Web Application for the administration, sale, and purchase of auto parts by the main insurance companies of the country. I Improved operations between distribution centers and the insurance company by 30%, making them more understandable and efficient for the end customer.
Tech Stack:  JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular 8, Liferay, Bootstrap4, Material, Html5, CSS, Java, Spring, Postgres, REST, AWS, GIT. 
Banco Davivienda — January, 2020 - July, 2020
Development of microservices to request a new credit card for a bank ally.I helped improve and optimize this product, which is still active today and is one of the key products for applying for credit cards.
Tech Stack: JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular 8, Material, Html5, CSS, NodeJS, REST, SOAP, GCP, GIT, Jenkins, Redis.
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Developer - (Angular - NodeJS)

profile_positions.description:
Development of a Web Application to consolidate the list of beneficiaries of the Doña Juana disaster in the city of Bogotá. I Assisted in the development of the uploading, evaluation and administration of victims' documents component, where 100% of the requests were answered.
Tech Stack: JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular 7, Bootstrap4, Html5, CSS, NodeJS, Postgres, REST, AWS, GIT, Jenkins.
profile_positions.title: FullStack Developer

profile_positions.description:
Development and updating of the process component of the National Cadastral System of Colombia. I developed an application that solved the totality of incidences that were overdue for 3 years in the cadastral information system, making the performance of the application improve.
Tech Stack: JavaScript, Selenium, BPEL, Java, Oracle, GIT, IBM WAS.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

company.name: Hexacta
company.description:
Hexacta, a GlobalLogic company, is a world-class IT services company with +20 years’ experience offering excellence in software development and digital transformation. 

We leverage our US presence and our nearshore Latin American centers to provide reliable and cost-effective services to some of the most demanding Fortune 500 companies.

Our work includes large-scale architectures with microservices, mobile apps, and solutions based on large volumes of data and artificial intelligence, in industries as diverse as financial services, energy, retail, entertainment, telecommunications, government, and tech.

Considered one of the Best 100 Outsourcing Companies in the World, we regularly rank at the top positions of the Great Place to Work survey in the markets where we operate.

Want to work with us? Get in touch!
